description:
Sized and shaped to let small adventurers explore winter. Adjustable two-step bindings are friendly to little feet and plastic traction rails keep things grippy. A decorative sticker pack lets imaginations run wild.

  • Molded solid plastic decks are stable and durable
  • Adjustable bindings fit a range of growing feet
  • Designed for kids from ages 3 and 6 up to 50lbs
  • Sticker pack lets kids decorate to their liking
name: Tubbs Snowflake Snowshoes - Children
